verses.verse: Now when <S%H428>these<s%> things were <S%H3615>done,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> have not <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves from the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>lands,<s%> doing according to their <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> even of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonites,<s%> the <S%H4124>Moabites,<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptians,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites.<s%>

For they have <S%H5375>taken<s%> of their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> for <S%H1992>themselves,<s%> and for their <S%H1121>sons:<s%> so that the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> have <S%H6148>mingled<s%> themselves with the <S%H5971>people<s%> of those <S%H776>lands:<s%> yes, the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers<s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H7223>chief<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4604>trespass.<s%>

And when I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> I <S%H7167>rent<s%> my <S%H899>garment<s%> and my <S%H4598>mantle,<s%> and <S%H4803>plucked<s%> off the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%> and of my <S%H2206>beard,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> down <S%H8074>astonished.<s%>

Then were <S%H622>assembled<s%> to me <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H2730>trembled<s%> at the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H4604>transgression<s%> of those that had been <S%H1473>carried<s%> <S%H1473>away;<s%> and I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>sacrifice.<s%>

And at the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4503>sacrifice<s%> I <S%H6965>arose<s%> up from my <S%H8589>heaviness;<s%> and having <S%H7167>rent<s%> my <S%H899>garment<s%> and my <S%H4598>mantle,<s%> I <S%H3766>fell<s%> on my <S%H1290>knees,<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> out my <S%H3709>hands<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> O my <S%H430>God,<s%> I am <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>blush<s%> to <S%H7311>lift<s%> up my <S%H6440>face<s%> to you, my <S%H430>God:<s%> for our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> are <S%H7235>increased<s%> <S%H4605>over<s%> our <S%H7218>head,<s%> and our <S%H819>trespass<s%> is <S%H1431>grown<s%> up to the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>

Since the <S%H3117>days<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have we been in a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H819>trespass<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> and for our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have we, our <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and our <S%H3548>priests,<s%> been <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>lands,<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> to <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> and to a <S%H961>spoil,<s%> and to <S%H1322>confusion<s%> of <S%H6440>face,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> for a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7281>space<s%> <S%H8467>grace<s%> has been showed from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H7604>leave<s%> us a remnant to <S%H6413>escape,<s%> and to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H3489>nail<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> that our <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H215>lighten<s%> our <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4241>reviving<s%> in our <S%H5659>bondage.<s%>

For we were <S%H5650>slaves;<s%> yet our <S%H430>God<s%> has not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> us in our <S%H5659>bondage,<s%> but has <S%H5186>extended<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to us in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H4241>reviving,<s%> to <S%H7311>set<s%> up the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H5975>repair<s%> the <S%H2723>desolations<s%> thereof, and to <S%H5414>give<s%> us a <S%H1447>wall<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
And <S%H6258>now,<s%> O our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall we <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H2063>this?<s%> for we have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%>

<S%H834>Which<s%> you have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> by your <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H776>land,<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, is an <S%H5079>unclean<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> with the <S%H5079>filthiness<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>lands,<s%> with their <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H4390>filled<s%> it from one <S%H6310>end<s%> to another with their <S%H2932>uncleanness.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H5414>give<s%> not your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> their <S%H7965>peace<s%> or their <S%H2896>wealth<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> that you may be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2898>good<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and leave it for an <S%H3423>inheritance<s%> to your <S%H1121>children<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H935>come<s%> on us for our <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4639>deeds,<s%> and for our <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H819>trespass,<s%> <S%H3588>seeing<s%> that you our <S%H430>God<s%> have <S%H2820>punished<s%> us <S%H4295>less<s%> than our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> deserve, and have <S%H5414>given<s%> us such <S%H6413>deliverance<s%> as <S%H2063>this;<s%>

Should we <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6565>break<s%> your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H2859>join<s%> in <S%H2859>affinity<s%> with the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations?<s%> would not you be <S%H599>angry<s%> with us <S%H5704>till<s%> you had <S%H3615>consumed<s%> us, so that there should be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7611>remnant<s%> nor <S%H6413>escaping?<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you are <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> for we <S%H7604>remain<s%> yet <S%H6413>escaped,<s%> as it is <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> we are <S%H6440>before<s%> you in our <S%H819>trespasses:<s%> for we <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H2063>this.<s%>
